<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// efficiently also with large functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;SparseBitVector&lt;&gt;&gt; LiveInSets;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Index = 0, e = MRI-&gt;getNumVirtRegs(); Index != e; ++Index) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the bit for this register for each MBB where it is</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find a safe location to insert the copy, this may be the first terminator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the block (or end()).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> InsertPos =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae5498526c74722ab28fc494f37de2ea8">findPHICopyInsertPoint</a>(&amp;opBlock, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, SrcReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert the copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;NewSrcInstr = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!reusedIncoming &amp;&amp; IncomingReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcUndef) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The source register is undefined, so there is no need for a real</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// COPY, but we still need to ensure joint dominance by defs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Insert an IMPLICIT&#95;DEF instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewSrcInstr =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#ad3ece0ac2421637044624c9b01c42466">DefMI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>-&gt;getVRegDef(SrcReg))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delete the debug location, since the copy is inserted into a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">        NewSrcInstr = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>-&gt;createPHISourceCopy(opBlock, InsertPos, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               SrcReg, SrcSubReg, IncomingReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only need to update the LiveVariables kill of SrcReg if this was the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// last PHI use of SrcReg to be lowered on this CFG edge and it is not live</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out of the predecessor. We can also ignore undef sources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LV &amp;&amp; !SrcUndef &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">        !VRegPHIUseCount&#91;BBVRegPair(opBlock.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3aa22d521bd6a7e6b9f35545dc7b0f1e">getNumber</a>(), SrcReg)&#93; &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">        !LV-&gt;isLiveOut(SrcReg, opBlock)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to be able to insert a kill of the register if this PHI (aka,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the copy we just inserted) is the last use of the source value. Live</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// variable analysis conservatively handles this by saying that the value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is live until the end of the block the PHI entry lives in. If the value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// really is dead at the PHI copy, there will be no successor blocks which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have the value live-in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Okay, if we now know that the value is not live out of the block, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can add a kill marker in this block saying that it kills the incoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In our final twist, we have to decide which instruction kills the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register.  In most cases this is the copy, however, terminator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions at the end of the block may also use the value. In this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case, we should mark the last such terminator as being the killing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block, not the copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> KillInst = opBlock.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> Term = InsertPos; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a> != opBlock.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">           ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a>-&gt;readsRegister(SrcReg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;TRI=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">          KillInst = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (KillInst == opBlock.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No terminator uses the register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (reusedIncoming || !IncomingReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We may have to rewind a bit if we didn&#39;t insert a copy this time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">          KillInst = InsertPos;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (KillInst != opBlock.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab2d91e7bec944efcbc39d8e30644f111">begin</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Reg &#42;is&#42; live-in to MBB, the interference is inevitable and a copy</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PHIEliminationImpl::isLiveOutPastPHIs(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((LV || LIS) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;isLiveOutPastPHIs() requires either LiveVariables or LiveIntervals&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LiveVariables considers uses in PHIs to be in the predecessor basic block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so that a register used only in a PHI is not live out of the block. In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contrast, LiveIntervals considers uses in PHIs to be on the edge rather</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than in the predecessor basic block, so that a register used only in a PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is live out of the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LIS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
